name: Fun Smiley Game
description:
Fun Smiley Game is brand new arcade game, where funny Emoji is rolling down the steps, trying not to fall into holes or under stone hammers.
Try all smiling faces, there is emoticon for every mood.
Easy to play - just tap the screen to change emoji direction. Easy but crazily addictive!
Let's have fun together, challenge with your friends and compare scores in leaderboard.
This new smileys game is for kids and for adults, it will keep you busy for many hours!
